local_intent: Verify gentle descent until contact with the T-block, confirming contact after a careful approach/alignment.
coherence_with_global: Follows perceive→align→act→verify: uses IsObjectVisible/Scan fallback, aligns to t_block, executes LowerUntilContact with (slow, 0.02, 10, 800), then verifies via ContactDetected. Matches the GLOBAL_BT phase around LowerUntilContact.
